LINKS.summary: Returns a list of all TCP links to and from peer nodes.
LINKS.complexity: O(N) where N is the total number of Cluster nodes

reply_schema.description: an array of cluster links and their attributes

direction.description: This link is established by the local node _to_ the peer, or accepted by the local node _from_ the peer.

node.description: the node id of the peer

create-time.description: unix time creation time of the link. (In the case of a _to_ link, this is the time when the TCP link is created by the local node, not the time when it is actually established.)

events.description: events currently registered for the link. r means readable event, w means writable event

send-buffer-allocated.description: allocated size of the link's send buffer, which is used to buffer outgoing messages toward the peer

send-buffer-used.description: size of the portion of the link's send buffer that is currently holding data(messages)
